gameRecap.title: Game Recap: Hawks 120, Trail Blazers 106
gameRecap.excerpt: Dejounte Murray led the Hawks with 30 points, four 3PM, three rebounds, and seven assists as Garrison Matthews totaled 21 points – his second consecutive 20-point game. Dalano Banton totaled a career-high with 31 points and nine assists, along with five rebounds. The Hawks have now won three in a row to move to 33-39 as the Blazers fall to 19-54.
